author: mmusich
body: Fix in the `ALCARECOPromptCalibProdSiStripGains_cff.py` configuration for running SiStrip Gain calibration at PCL. First detected [here](https://hypernews.cern.ch/HyperNews/CMS/get/calibrations/1707.html), followed-up [here](https://hypernews.cern.ch/HyperNews/CMS/get/tracker-performance/1772/1/1.html)
title: Fixing PromptCalibProdSiStripGains to work in 75X
